meanings.sent1: The uncoded message was easy to read.
meanings.sent2: The uncoded document contained plain text.
meanings.sent3: The uncoded file felt like a secret diary left open.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were like an uncoded language to him.
meanings.sent5: The uncoded information was as clear as a sunny day.

meanings.sent1: The uncoded symbols puzzled the archaeologists.
meanings.sent2: The uncoded ancient text remained a mystery.
meanings.sent3: The uncoded message seemed like a riddle without an answer.
meanings.sent4: His expression was an uncoded map of confusion.
meanings.sent5: The uncoded language sounded like a song without lyrics.

meanings.sent1: The uncoded data was vulnerable to hackers.
meanings.sent2: The uncoded transmission was intercepted easily.
meanings.sent3: The uncoded email felt like a postcard without an envelope.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like uncoded whispers in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The uncoded message was as exposed as a light bulb in the dark.
